name: dweller (R0A5TED, gunkan)
description:
Your family lived in this house for several generations and now someone wants to throw you out of it to build another office building. Defend your estate from heartless officials with the use of water guns you bought for your grandchildren.

Discover several enemies with various skills, decorate your yard with one of the fancy fences and pour some sense into the heads of bureaucrats with different water guns.

Ingenious idea of game screen divided into four parts from which the opponents come will make you plan your next move. 

Simple controls will allow everyone to play, just slide and tap!
